title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server that pulls, runs, and serves GGUF models locally with a built-in model library and OpenAI-compatible REST endpoints.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, and manage models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama with sync/async APIs, streaming support, and model management helpers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama for chat, generation, and embeddings pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) for chatting, model management, and multi-user workspaces; runs via Docker.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store for question-answering over PDFs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI with interactive model picker, conversation history, and shell completion.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive streaming support.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selectors and PVC support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration providing Ollama generators and embedders for end-to-end NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate with async client, strong typing, and streaming support for Ollama’s HTTP API.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for common patterns: function calling, structured output, fine-tune adapters, and more.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module with decorators and dependency injection for integrating Ollama services.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component that embeds a chat interface backed by Ollama models with token streaming.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client generated from OpenAPI specs with context cancellation and retry logic.

title: ollama-rustlang
summary: Lightweight Rust wrapper exposing Ollama endpoints as Rocket or Axum REST handlers.

title: ollama-azure
summary: Azure template deploying Ollama on Container Apps with GPU autoscaling and managed identity.
